title: The Sweet By and By
description: Forced by circumstances into each other's lives, Margaret Clayton and Bernice Stokes have become best friends. Old in years but young in spirit, the two meet in a home in eastern North Carolina at a time of life when the sameness of each day creeps into every page of the calendar. For Margaret and Bernice, however, this season marks the beginning of an unlikely and amazing friendship.
author: Todd  Johnson
